progettose

Class LineShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • progettose.LineShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShapeInterface

    public class LineShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements ShapeInterface
    Class to manage the creation of a LineShape that is a wrapper for the real JavaFX shape : Line

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LineShape(javafx.scene.shape.Line shape, double x, double y)
      This method is the constructor of the EllipseShape

      In this method we manage the visibility of the box based on the selection of the line

        This method is the constructor of the EllipseShape
        Parameters:
        shape - This is the first parameter that represents the line shape
        x - This is the second parameter that represents the X coordinate of the center of the line
        y - This is the second parameter that represents the X coordinate of the center of the line In this method we create the shape and the bounding box calling the bound() method
